```{r, 'image', echo=F, message=F, warning=F, include=F, fig.height=2, fig.width=4}
library("tidyverse")

theta <- seq(0,1,length=500)

df <- tibble(
  row = 1:500, 
  a = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 6.00), 
  b = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 6.25), 
  c = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 6.50), 
  d = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 6.75), 
  e = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 7.00),
  f = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 7.25),
  g = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 7.50),
  h = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 7.75),
  i = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 8.00),
  j = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 8.25), 
  k = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 8.50), 
  l = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 8.75), 
  m = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 9.00), 
  n = dgamma(x = theta, shape = 1.85, rate = 9.25)
  ) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = -row) %>% 
  filter(value != Inf)

ggplot(data = df, aes(x = row, y = value, color = name)) +
  geom_line(show.legend = F) + 
  scale_color_viridis_d(option = "C") + 
  theme_void()

```
